reporting_cycle: Secretary-General reports on a regular basis
summary:
The Security Council,

Recalling previous resolutions on Iraq, reaffirms Iraq's independence, sovereignty, unity, and territorial integrity.

The Council extends the mandate of the United Nations Assistance Mission for Iraq (UNAMI) for 12 months from the date of this resolution.

The Council expresses its intention to review UNAMI's mandate in 12 months or sooner if requested by the Government of Iraq.

The Council requests the Secretary-General to regularly update on the International Compact of Iraq.

The Council decides to remain seized of the matter.
